name: Roe Park Resort

reviews.text: Stayed a few years back. Hotel good, but on our last day i left my brand new wedding ring in the bathroom after a shower. As we left the cleaners were just about to clean it. Later, when i realised about my ring i phoned management. Needless to say the ring could not be found even though it would stand out like a sore thumb. In addition the staff member gave the distinct impression that he didn't really give a monkey's!! Again, beautiful hotel, just lock everything up or take it with you. Shameful!!
reviews.title: Ring Disater

reviews.text: Our first family week end break to Radisson Roe ,was a very pleasant and enjoyable experience. On arriving at a lovely hotel in its spacious grounds and greeted in reception by friendly and efficient staff we were not dissapoinnted by the interior decor of all the hotel and especially our bedroom .The facilities were exellent and spotlessly clean. The food in both restaurants were exellent and service intentive without being intrusive. We would highly reconmend this hotel with out reservation , the staff made it an enjoyable stay ,from the start to finish , from reception to the room cleaners and the waiting staff were friendly and work hard to make it so.
reviews.title: Highly Reconmended Radisson Roe Experience

reviews.text: We are looking forward to another break ,we are hooked and as Arnie would say ill be back ....
reviews.title: Must Try Harder

description: Welcome to the Roe Park Resort – one of Northern Ireland's premiere golf and spa resorts. Overlooking its own stunning 18 hole golf course and set amidst the gorgeous surroundings of the Roe Valley Country Park, this 4 star luxury hotel boasts 118 stylish en suite rooms that blend the charm of a country house estate with the modern luxuries and conveniences you'd expect from a 4-star luxury hotel.
